script.text: Help me! There’s... there’s a... a...
I am Orobas, assistant to Vice Monarch Amdusias!
What are you two doing here?! Why is she in my house?!
She almost scared me to death!
Who just walks into someone’s house and uses their furniture?!
She’s probably going through your house now, not just sitting on your chair.
Yeah, she’s creepy. You better go check on her.
ARE YOU STILL IN MY HOUSE?!
You ran outside before I had a chance to speak. Did you meet my assistant, Orobas?
Don’t change the subject! What are you doing here?!
I came here to see what kind of individual you are. Andre spoke very highly of you.
I do not know why. I am not impressed by what I see.
Are these the same comic books you were caught reading during the crisis?
No. Those are a different series.
They are all the same! What would you have done if something happened while you were slacking?!
Forget it. Andre has already dealt with you.
Tell me why. I want to know why.
Why did you feel it necessary to even bring these with you while on duty?! Were you bored?!
As a Vassal, you should be concerned with your duties at all times!
You should desire to move ever upward!
You lack dedication and focus. That is unacceptable.
Trebol deserves more. The Blackjack Isles deserve more.
You will be placed under my employ. I will teach you to be more.
There will be no more of this while you’re on duty!
Hey! You’ll ruin it! It’s a first edition!
I do not care if it’s any edition! It—
THAT'S LUCIE! NOW GIVE IT BACK!
Is that... is that supposed to be me?!
Get REAL! Even when losing to Lucie, Amdy is way cooler than you'll ever be!
You went to “Hellside Expo” in order to publish wild tales regarding what we higher-ranking commanders have been doing!
Where the hell did THAT come from?!
You were spying on us in order to provide the author with more material! That is treason! I can have you brought in!
The evidence is scattered all around the room. You were definitely at Hellside Expo.
I just went there to buy comics!
Vassal Beleth, you will tell me how we have come to be in this comic book!
I have no idea! I didn't even realize that was supposed to be you! Now give it back!
I am leaving. I will be taking this with me.
I do not care. In fact, I—
Looks like someone knows how to not just barge into someone else’s house. Excuse me.
It appears you have a pest problem.
I think you have a pest problem.
Nothing. It’s nothing you would be interested in, I’m sure. Just comic stuff.
Nothing. Go about your business. Ignore me.
Fall asleep watching your inane television program again.
You said you were leaving. What happened to that?
I will leave when I am ready to leave. You are in no position to issue me an order.
I’m on vacation. You are in no position to issue me an order.
In your fool-comic! What happens to me?!
Oh! The fool-comic! Sorry, I don't read that one.
In... Suit Yourself. Tell me what happens. Now.
You lost to Lu— er, Pride, I guess. Then she cursed you to a lifetime of misery.
How does it end? Tell me how it ends!
Ah, I would do, but I can't.
Nobody knows how it ends. The author took a break.
Well, last time they took a break, they said it was only going to be a week, but it was actually several months.
They might do a filler arc next, too. Like an intermission kind of deal. They hinted at it.
What— what do you mean this is my theme song?!
Hey, are you going to leave any time soon? I need to, uh, go...
What establishment is open this time during a storm?!
Back again? How did it go?
I don’t see how you can stand to be her assistant! She’s so uptight!
She’s not so bad once she realizes you’re not going to be scared off by her, uh, personality.
She even managed to scare a Bweehorse away. Wow.
You’re not gonna help fulfill Pride’s curse?
Yeah, I wouldn't want to be around her for very long either.
Can you go do something about her?
Sure thing! Is she doing okay?
But it’s not my problem. I’m on vacation.
